attributes.action: reconsider EfW incinerators and use healthier, more cost effective and environmentally sound alternatives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Incinerators are outdated technology which destroy recycling efforts and jobs. They contribute to air and water pollution; costing our NHS in cancer care over the next few decades.
Alternatives include glass include anaerobic digestion, improvements of packaging, increased recycling, to name only a few. Incinerators create ash which still requires landfill - which is running out fast, we need to prevent the waste from being created in the first place. Incinerators are not sustainable and produce tonnes of CO2 emmisions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
